node.doctext:
[% my $str = ""; my $count = 0; my @nodes = $DB->getNodeWhere({type_nodetype => getNode("htmlpage","nodetype")->{node_id}}); foreach my $n (@nodes) { my $fullnode = $DB->getNodeById($n->{node_id}); next unless($fullnode->{page} =~ /\S/); $count++; $str .= linkNodeTitle($n->{title})."
"; } return "To go: $count
$str
"; %] [% my $str = ""; foreach my $key (keys %ENV){ $str .= "$key: $ENV{$key}
"; } return $str; %]
node.title: jaybonci's sandbox
